description:
The Aube Hunters enter Celestizam while Hyuga stays outside. Angelique has an audience with the Religious leader and sorts out her emotions. When leaving she runs into Roche, which persistently tries to get an exclusive interview. Angelique escapes with the help of Rene and is taken to his secret place the Silver Tree. Meanwhile J.D is starting to have a problem and is trying to desperately hide it from his friends
Source: crunchyroll
